jtorrent.common

Class JTorrent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jtorrent.common.JTorrent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JTracker.TorrentRef

    public class JTorrent
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple torrent implementation. Contains information about a file being shared by peers such as the file's name, size, number of chunks, chunk size, and SHA-1 hashes for each chunk.

      • JTorrent

        public JTorrent(Metainfo torrent,
                boolean seeder)
         throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                java.io.IOException,
                java.net.URISyntaxException
        Create a torrent from a meta-info file.
        Parameters:
        torrent - Metainfo object representing a meta-info file.
        seeder - Whether this file will be seeded or not.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.IOException
        java.net.URISyntaxException
